summary: The Soviet Story offers an alternative history of an Allied power, which helped the Nazis to fight Jews and which slaughtered its own people on an industrial scale.
cast: Jon Strickland|Vladimir Bukovsky|V.I. Lenin|Norman Davies|Nikolay Melnik|Volodimir Sergiychuk|Boris Sokolov|Pierre Rigoulot|Françoise Thom|Alfred Rosenberg|Adolf Hitler|George Watson|Joseph Goebbels|Hermann Göring|George Bernard Shaw|Adolf Eichmann|Aleksandr Guryanov|Nicolas Werth|Vladimir Karpov|Nikita Khrushchev|Mikhail Gorbachev|Joseph Stalin|Natalia Lebedeva|Sergei Slutsh|Ari Vatanen|Franklin D. Roosevelt|Vyacheslav Molotov|Heinrich Himmler|Winston Churchill|Viktor Suvorov|Igor Rodionov|Leon Trotsky|Emma Korpa|Christopher Beazley|Inese Vaidere|Rita Papina|Janis Dzintars|Vladimir Putin|Andre Brie|Boris Yeltsin|Wojciech Roszkowski|Leonid Ragozin|Nikolay Kuryanovitsh|Ratko Mladic|Girts Valdis Kristovskis|Michael Gahler
title: The Soviet Story
